info.description: APIs to configure multiple envoy proxies
info.title: Enroute API

get.description: Get a list of all proxies
Get a detailed version of list of proxies
Get a detailed version of specified proxy

parameters.description: Name of proxy for which to list services
parameters.name: proxy_name

get.description: Get a list of all secrets for all services

post.description:
Set the secret cert from file
Example curl -X POST -F 'Secret_cert=@certificate.pem' http://localhost:1323/secret/testsecret/cert | python -m json.tool
post.summary: Set the secret cert from file

parameters.description: Location of file holding the secret cert
parameters.name: secret_cert

post.description:
Set the secret key from file
Example curl -X POST -F 'Secret_key=@private_key.pem' http://localhost:1323/secret/testsecret/key | python -m json.tool
post.summary: Set the secret key from file

parameters.description: Location of file holding the secret key
parameters.name: secret_key

get.description: Get a list of all services for all proxies

post.description: Copy a route on source service to a destination service
post.summary: Copy a route on source service to a destination service

post.description: Deep copy service copies service, associated routes and upstream associations. Upstream copies are not created.
